desc.coffee.drink: §7If you are reading this §6Yirmiri §7can be the one to blame for forgetting to add a description.
desc.green_tea.drink: §7A sweet earthly brew that soothes the drinker.
desc.milk.drink: §7Milk is known to stain into cups, you might want to bring a §6backup cup.
desc.mango_tea.drink: §7A mango a day keeps the doctor away.
desc.black_tea.drink: §7Black tea makes a good rocket fuel.
desc.generic.drink: §7If you are reading this §6Yirmiri §7can be the one to blame for forgetting to add a description.
tooltip.coffee.drink: §9Slightly increases digging, attack speed and decreasing attack strength...
tooltip.dark_coffee.drink: §9Increases digging, attack speed and decreasing attack strength...
tooltip.green_tea.drink: §9Slowly regenerates the player's health for a short time...
tooltip.mango_tea.drink: §9The effect for this tea is still work in progress, cough §6Yirmiri...
tooltip.black_tea.drink: §9The effect for this tea is still work in progress, cough §6Yirmiri...
effect.dried_spice.vulnerability.descrip: Reduces the armor points of the user.
effect.dried_spice.health_reduction.desc: Reduces the health points of the user.
effect.dried_spice.tough_skin.descriptio: The user of the effect no longer takes knockback and is immune to explosion damage.
effect.dried_spice.fast_falling.descript: Decreases the jump height of the user.
effect.dried_spice.drowsy.description: Locks the current time of all potion effects the user has.
effect.dried_spice.blood_clot.descriptio: The user no longer has any means of regenerating health points.
effect.dried_spice.building_fatigue.desc: The user can no longer build or destroy any blocks.
effect.dried_spice.true_invisibility.des: Similar to invisibility but particles and armor do not appear.
effect.dried_spice.fire_skin.description: Attackers of the user with this effect applied burn for a short time.
effect.dried_spice.trail_blazing.descrip: When the user walks a trail of fire follows behind and has a built in fire resistance.
effect.dried_spice.water_walking.descrip: The user with this applied can walk on water.
effect.dried_spice.pyromaniac.descriptio: When the user is inside of fire they regenerate health at a rapid rate.
effect.dried_spice.hyper_elasticity.desc: When the user of the effect falls from a height they bounce back upwards and take decreased fall damage.
effect.dried_spice.enigma.description: Mobs cannot see the user with this effect applied.
effect.dried_spice.steel_feet.descriptio: Removes fall damage for the user with this effect applied.
effect.dried_spice.lava_walking.descript: The user with this applied can walk on lava... just make sure to bring fire resistance.
effect.dried_spice.lesser_damage_boost.d: Slightly increases attack damage of the user.
effect.dried_spice.lesser_weakness.descr: Slightly decreases attack damage of the user.
effect.dried_spice.perception.descriptio: All living entities in a small radius of the user are inflicted with glowing including the user.
desc.ancient_tea.drink: §7Despite it smelling horrible, the ancient tea picks your attention.
tooltip.ancient_tea.drink: §9Increases interaction/build reach for the player for a short time...
